snippet: Hundreds of parents in northwestern Pakistan were arrested and jailed on charges of endangering public security after refusing to allow their children to be vaccinated for polio, officials said Monday.
abstract: Pakistan authorities arrest 471 parents in northwestern Pakistan for refusing to let their children be vaccinated against polio; parents fear vaccine makes their children sterile; Pakistan is one of three countries where polio is endemic and had majority of cases last year.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of parents in northwestern Pakistan were arrested and jailed on charges of endangering public security after refusing to allow their children to be vaccinated for polio, officials said Monday.
